channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL

item.title: Report X-2024010123
item.description:
Report X-2024010123

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-11T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: LAKELAND
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE INSIDE LEAKED OUT BEING SOAKED UP ON THE CARDBOARD BOX. HAD A BAD SMELL, AND THE ITEM INSIDE CONTAINING A SYMBOL THAT SHOW ETHYLENE TO BE EXPLOSIVE AND WAS SEALED OFF AND REQUEST OUTSIDE HELP WHICH A VENDOR PLACE IT INSIDE A DRUM. LATER ON, AN FWN FORM WAS PROCESSED AND THE GENERATOR AND BOX THAT CAME IN WAS SEPARATED DUE TO DISPOSAL VENDER REQUEST ONCE THE RECIEVED SDS SHEET. THE GENERATOR REMAINS INSIDE THE DRUM, BUT THE CARDBOARD BOX AND LEFTOVERS REMAIN TO BE PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2024010317
item.description:
Report X-2024010317

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-26
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Plastic pail arrived on the IC Belt leaking in a black tote. It was removed and placed inside a red tote and HazMat bag. It then was moved to the HazMat Cage. DescribePack: Item had no box. The plastic pail had a dent on its lid, which came loose and spilled out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was taken out of the black tote and placed inside a red tote and HazMat bag. It then was moved to the HazMat Cage.

item.title: Report X-2024010316
item.description:
Report X-2024010316

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-26
  • City: COCOA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was being unloaded from a trailer when it was discovered that it was leaking. It was immediately placed in a double lined hazmat bin and moved to a well-ventilated area. DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately placed in a double lined hazmat bin and moved to a well-ventilated area.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The 5-gallon plastic pail was found damaged in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The pail was punctured on the bottom, causing contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The pail was placed upside down into a hazbag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120634
item.description:
Report X-2023120634

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & had gasoline scent. Upon inspection 1 Pulsar PGDA70BiSCO 7250-watts inverter generator was found with gasoline inside. Gas leak out of cap. A document found inside informing shipper to drain gas & oil out before shipping to location to inspect unit. DescribePack: Generator had gasoline inside. Spill gasoline out of cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.
